group_1.narration: So we all went to the amusement park@as a team, to stop feeling so down.
At first, it felt wrong to have@fun at a time like that...
But Master said, "Let's enjoy ourselves,@like when Mel was here with us."
And that got us through it.

group_1.textRight: Ah, I had so much fun!
I never met anyone who screamed on a@merry-go-round.

group_1.textLeft: It was an ultra-high-speed merry-go-round!@I'd never seen such a thing!

group_1.textRight: Haha...
Ha ha ha!
Did you have fun, Tsuruno?
Tsuruno, what's wrong? Are you worn out@from everything?
Um, were you listening to a thing we were@just saying?
Amazing...

group_1.narration: I wasn't worn out,@I just had way too much fun.
We just threw ourselves into the rides@and attractions, so we wouldn't have to@think, or push ourselves too hard.
We just kept spinning,@round and round.
We forgot all about our@sadness and worries...
Our hearts were filled with joy again.

group_1.textLeft: You've been lost in thought for quite a @while.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*

group_1.textLeft: Hm? Did you remember something funny?

group_1.textRight: Um, yeah... I did!

group_1.textLeft: Were you remembering a fun amusement park?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
It had an ultra-high-speed merry-go-round,@and a gigantic teacup ride.
It was so much fun...

group_1.textLeft: Are you saying that you want to make@an extreme amusement park?

group_1.textRight: Not exactly... It wasn't fun because the@rides were fast or big.
It was nice because we didn't have to think@about anything once we got on.

group_1.textLeft: So, after you boarded, you could sit back@and relax?

group_1.textRight: Exactly!
It was an amusement park where I could@sit back and really relax.
(Yeah...)
(Mikazuki Villa was fun, but I couldn't@relax there at all.)
(My job was to keep smiling and lighten the@mood.)
(I felt like everything would crash down if I@didn't keep it together all the time.)
(I didn't even try to find out the truth@about Mel...)
(It felt like everything would fall to pieces@if I knew what happened.)
(So I just forced a smile, and didn't@ask any questions.)

group_1.textLeft: The theme of Chelation Land should be...
"A place to sit back and relax", is that@correct?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I think so!
Let's go with that!

group_1.textLeft: The missing pieces have come together.

group_1.narration: Have you heard? Has anyone told you?@The Rumor of Chelation Land.
A stress-free theme park where you can@relax to your heart's content and be happy!@And it's the grand openingâ™ª
You won't wanna leave! No way! And you don't@have to! You can stay as long as you want!
Oh, but, attention please! If it reaches max@capacity, you'll be removed from this world.@It's a hot rumor rolling through Kamihama!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* This new creation isn't half bad.

group_1.textCenter: Where I can feel completely safe...
I'm never going home. The Magius have given@me a place where I can feel at ease.
